text:
Brad Pitt's dating history has been an open book that continues to fascinate fans and followers alike. As a celebrated Hollywood icon, his personal life has been under constant scrutiny, leaving admirers eager to know the latest in his romantic endeavors. Our editors have diligently researched updated information on Brad Pitt's relationship history by scouring various entertainment news sources and social media to compile this comprehensive list for you.

Throughout the years, Brad's romantic journey has involved several prominent partners. Notably, he has had two marriages, both of which ended in divorce. Brad Pitt's first wife was the beautiful and talented actress Jennifer Aniston, whom he married in 2000, with their union lasting five years before ending in 2005. Following this, Brad began a relationship with his Mr. & Mrs. Smith co-star Angelina Jolie, which led to them becoming one of Hollywood's most well-known couples. Brad and Angelina eventually wed, becoming Brad Pitt's second wife in 2014, but ultimately filed for divorce in September 2016.

In addition to these relationships, Brad has also been linked to several other high-profile women in the entertainment industry, further expanding upon the captivating story of Brad Pitt's dating history. We invite you to explore this detailed list to discover more about the actor, his past loves, and what shaped him into the person he is today. So, sit back, relax, and enjoy this journey through Brad Pitt's girlfriends, wives, and romantic experiences.
